content: Please note that this Prediction Contest is exclusively for participants of Sportsbet.io sponsored Football Pools @ https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5461024.0Premier LeagueLa LigaSerie A BundesligaSão Paulo FC vs BotafogoSaturday nightFootball Prediction Contest!Oddshttps://sportsbet.io/sports/event/soccer/brazil/brasileiro-serie-a/sao-paulo-fc-sp-v-botafogo-fr-rj-64d4fae8cdcb530001560011Rulesa.  Predict the winner (1x2) (SPFC, Botafogo or Draw)(must get correct to proceed)b.  Predict the Final score (1x2)  (must get correct to proceed)c.  First team to score? (SPFC, Botafogo or None)(must get correct to proceed)d.  Total Corners 10.5? (Over or Under)  (must get correct to proceed)e.  Goals scored in both halves? (Yes or No)   (must get correct to proceed)f.  Tiebreaker:  Predict the MINUTE of the 1st Goal Scored (doesn't matter which team scores)Examplea.  SPFCb.  2-1c.  SPFCd.  Overe.  Yes  f.  25'Prize2 mBTC Free Bet(Small print)* Tiebreaker will include a 10 minute handicap for quicker prediction *
